idea: ADM Digital Marketing is a digital marketing agency based in Mumbai, India. We partner with brands to grow visibility, website traffic, and achieve higher search engine rankings through our mix internet marketing services. We help clients increase their organic search traffic by using the latest best practices and most ethical and fully-integrated search engine optimization (SEO) techniques. Our digital marketing services include SEO, PPC, Social Media Marketing, Email Marketing, Custom Email Database, Whats App Marketing, SMS Marketing, Website Design, and Development. Over the past years, we partnered with many brands and executed campaigns for over so many websites, helping them dominate in even highly competitive industries, via capturing placements that maximize impressions and traffic. â€‹

idea: Parkr provides a solution for vehicle owners to discover suitable parking, navigate to the spot by using live maps, book the slot in advance and pay using various digital options. We will work with the civic bodies like Municipal Corporations of respective cities for on-street and off-street parking, Shopping Malls, Office complex, housing societies or any building structure for covered parking and cater to events across the country. To strengthen our solution we propose the use of parking sensors, Internet of Things (IoT) and AI / Machine Learning (ML). and any future and upcoming technology
name: Parkr
